analysis.description:
ACAToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/7/0x830fa4f66044fba350c0359c0c81da1916be5211.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/7/0x830fa4f66044fba350c0359c0c81da1916be5211.sol)

ACAToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x830fa4f66044fba350c0359c0c81da1916be5211.sol#110-111)
ACAToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x830fa4f66044fba350c0359c0c81da1916be5211.sol#107-110)
ACAToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x830fa4f66044fba350c0359c0c81da1916be5211.sol#110)
